channel.title: Plans for the future...Upate!
channel.description:
I've been running my server for over a year now, and in that time my partner and I have been creating a new server and we've been working on this for about 6months.. Currently there's not many pics to really show, because most of this that is discussed is future updates.. We calculate another 6months to complete the new server..
[ul][li] Find out how to get new fonts fro 4XX or 5XX to fix 0's or larger fonts for welcome screen fix chat button modes do something with music tab, don't need commands anymore. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Music is gay, fix report abuse window, maybe get new interface - when reporting, grab global and private messages too. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Fix player ID's taking too long to update, find a new way to stop dual login, current way is too memory consuming. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Find a way to pack or encode sprites to prevent faggots from stealing them - color encryption idea: replace each color integer with a new one, so when the image is view normally, it's totally fucked up color wise, and can only be displayed properly by our client.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Build my own encoder/decorder in either VB6 or Java find a way to add a dummy bite onto all sprites to make them not work in any image viewer, remove the btye ONLY in memory of the client so people can't view the images, but the client can still read them.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Add quick-processing item settings when server loads, already determined item slots via item name, now check for robe top/bottom from item description.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Determine if an item is note from item description.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Determine if an item is notable, do + 1 to idea, if item name matches its noteable - dump tradeable and stackable info, update byte stack/note files with new data to save proc time. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Make a new weapons handler so all weapon animations, gfx, and timers are in one single place. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Make wilderness perfect, with levels, npcs, multi zones, etc.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Work on making combat appear more like real runescape expand more cities, more shops, more npcs, etc.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Finish up the item drop database for all npcs
Here's a pic: [IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa32/pwnifiedj/monsterdb.jpg[/img][/li][/ul]
[ul][li] In game finish up patching all skills. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Do mini games: - castle wars - - run a global CW timer, scores, etc - - make inCastleWars function to determine if a player is in CW.[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Fight pits - - do REAL fight pits with globl timer like CW, can't join games in progress, etc - - do real tokkul currency. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]NEED working staking![/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Find out better way of handling SQL connections, some times my current method fails to save characters or load characters at the same time. [/li][/ul]
[ul][li] Build object-click queue system bulld my own cache packer to only pack the items that are needed, lots of dead, unused files like sound and music that make cache huge.[/li][/ul]
When you actually program a server and not rip tuts, it takes a long time..
**** Update****
Worked on the npc DB some more
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/15n8zr7.jpg[/img]
Npc that are complete:
1, TzHaar-Xil* 2, TzHarr-Ket* 3, TzHaar-Hur* 4, TzHaar-Mej*
dag bosses*
Abyssal Demon* Black Demon* Greater Demon* Lesser Demon*
Rock crabs* Skeletons* Chaos Druids*
Still a ton more to do.. Since the new server will have 100 percent real slayer, gotta do all the drops.. FUN FUN
Also Lil preview of the website
What users will see when they login [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2niqkg6.jpg[/img]
Also working recovery system.. The questions are radomized but users can change the questions if they want..
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2uqbrsi.jpg[/img]
I'll keep bumping this topic with new updates...

item.title: Plans for the future...Upate!
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:268944”][quote author=satesql link=topic=354859.msg2718008#msg2718008 date=1237760321]

Ohh, nice. How much progress have you achieved in 6 months?

Stability, mysql integration, perfect weapon timers, perfect mage, unique client interfaces, new quests…
[/quote]
Nice…I wish you good luck with this. ;)[/quote]

Thank you and I’ll be updating this whenever we finish something.

Read full topic
